name: Duck Planet
description:
Built during the Coherence Game Jam 2022: https://www.coherence.io/

Play it in WebGL here: https://coherence.io/games/coherencejam22/duck-planet

An online realtime multiplayer game where you are a duck and have to be king of a planet.
Run into the crown to pick it up! Slap other ducks when they have the crown! You can not slap when you are the King as you have to set a good example.

The planet is dangerous; avoid the asteroids!

Controls:

  • Move -> WASD
  • Slap -> Left Mouse Click
  • Emotion -> Number 1, 2 and 3
  • Show Credits -> Escape

Credits:

Andy Touch - Developer

Gabriel Jadderson - Developer and VFX

Kal O'Brien - 3D Artist and VFX

Dominic Ninmark - Audio
